00022 #ifndef TBUTTON_H
00023 #define TBUTTON_H
00024 
00025 #include <inttypes.h>
00026 
00027 #define kButtonTextMaxWidth   25
00028 #define kCharHeight           7
00029 #define kCharWidth            6
00030 #define kCharHeightHalf      (kCharHeight/2)
00031 
00032 class TButton
00033 {
00034     private:
00035         char buttonText[kButtonTextMaxWidth];
00036         int16_t left;
00037         int16_t top;
00038         int16_t right;
00039         int16_t bottom;
00040         int16_t textLeft;
00041         int16_t textTop;
00042         int16_t textWidth;
00043         uint8_t fColorRed;
00044         uint8_t fColorGreen;
00045         uint8_t fColorBlue;
00046         uint8_t bColorRed;
00047         uint8_t bColorGreen;
00048         uint8_t bColorBlue;
00049         uint8_t backColorRed;
00050         uint8_t backColorGreen;
00051         uint8_t backColorBlue;
00052         uint8_t pColorRed;
00053         uint8_t pColorGreen;
00054         uint8_t pColorBlue;
00055         bool touchState;
00056         bool touchStatePrev;
00057         void flashButton(void);
00058 
00059     public:
00060         TButton(char * text, int16_t left, int16_t top);
00061         bool GetTouch(void);
00062         void SetText(char * text);
00063         void SetForeground(uint8_t red, uint8_t green, uint8_t blue);
00064         void SetBackground(uint8_t red, uint8_t green, uint8_t blue);
00065         void Paint(void);
00066 };
00067 
00068 #endif
